column.name: bbcodeId
column.comment: A unique identifier for the word.

column.name: bbcodeName
column.comment: The name of the BBcode for display purposes.

column.name: options
column.comment:
A bitfield containing column options:

1 - Enabled (TRUE) | Disabled (FALSE)
2 - Can be Toggled by Rooms (TRUE) | Cannot be Toggled by Rooms (FALSE)
4 - Default to On For Rooms (TRUE) | Default to Off for Rooms (FALSE)

column.name: searchRegex
column.comment: The regex to use for BBcode searching.

column.name: replacement
column.comment: The replacement text to be used.

column.name: listId
column.comment: The unique ID of the censor list.

column.name: listId
column.comment: The list ID which is being affected.

column.name: roomId
column.comment: The room ID the status is being applied to.

column.name: status
column.comment: The status of the list in regards to the room - either explicit block or explicit unblock.

column.name: listId
column.comment: The unique ID of the list.

column.name: listName
column.comment: The name of the list. It is only used for user identification.

column.name: listType
column.comment: The list type - black to apply to no rooms automatically, and white to apply to all rooms automatically (opt-in vs. opt-out)

column.name: options
column.comment: A bitfield of specific options for the list.

column.name: wordId
column.comment: A unique identifier for the word.

column.name: listId
column.comment: The ID of the list the word is filed under.

column.name: word
column.comment: The word text.

column.name: severity
column.comment: The severity/type of word.

column.name: param
column.comment: The action data for the word, used in multiple ways based on the word's severity.

column.name: fileId
column.comment: A unique ID for the file.

column.name: fileName
column.comment: The file's name to be sent for downloading.

column.name: fileType
column.comment: The file's mime-type/content-type.

column.name: creationTime
column.comment: The date the file was uploaded.

column.name: userId
column.comment: The ID of the user who uploaded the file.

column.name: source
column.comment: The file's source - in most cases

column.name: rating
column.comment: The file's parental content age rating.

column.name: flags
column.comment: A comma-seperated list of parent content flags to apply to the file.

column.name: deleted
column.comment: Whether or not the file in question is deleted.

column.name: versionId
column.comment: A unique identifier for all file versions, regardless of each file.

column.name: fileId
column.comment: The ID of the parent file.

column.name: time
column.comment: The time of the revision of the file was uploaded.

column.name: size
column.comment: The size of the revision.

column.name: md5hash
column.comment: The MD5 hash of the file's binary data.

column.name: sha256hash
column.comment: The SHA256 hash of the file's binary data.

column.name: salt
column.comment: The salt number (stored in the product configuration) used for encryption.

column.name: iv
column.comment: The base64-encoded IV used for encryption.

column.name: contents
column.comment: The base64-encoded binary data of the file.

column.name: fontId
column.comment: The unique ID of the font.

column.name: groupId
column.comment: The unique ID of the group.

column.name: groupName
column.comment: The name of the group.

column.name: userFormatStart
column.comment: Username formatted to be prepended to the username.

column.name: userFormatEnd
column.comment: Username formatted to be appended to the username.

column.name: hookId
column.comment: A unique ID corrosponding to the hook. It is not used in retrieving hook contents (and thus could, for whatever reason, be changed on a dime).

column.name: hookName
column.comment: The hook's name, which will be used for most identification. These can be compounded (multiple rows with the same hookname can exist) if multiple entries exist for the hook.

column.name: code
column.comment: The code of the particular hook. It will be executed using PHP's EVAL.

column.name: state
column.comment: Whether or not the hook is active.

column.name: userId
column.comment: The ID of the user who has been kicked.

column.name: roomId
column.comment: The ID of the room the kick is active in.

column.name: kickerid
column.comment: The ID of the user who made the kick.

column.name: time
column.comment: The time the kick was made on.

column.name: length
column.comment: The time the kick will remain active for.

column.name: messageId
column.comment: The unique ID of the message.

column.name: userId
column.comment: The ID of the user who made the message.

column.name: roomId
column.comment: The ID of the room the message was made in.

column.name: rawText
column.comment: The raw (uncensored, unformatted) text of the message.

column.name: htmlText
column.comment: The HTML-formatted text of the message.

column.name: apiText
column.comment: The API-formatted text of the message.

column.name: salt
column.comment: The ID of the salt used for encryption (with the corrosponding value found in the product's configuration file).

column.name: iv
column.comment: The base64-encoded IV used for encryption.

column.name: deleted
column.comment: Whether or not the message has been deleted by an administrator.

column.name: time
column.comment: The time the message was made on.

column.name: ip
column.comment: The IP of the user who made the message.

column.name: flag
column.comment: The content-type flag of the message (e.g. video, image, text, archive, html, url, email).

column.name: id
column.comment: A unique (temporary) ID for the message cache entry.

column.name: messageId
column.comment: The ID of the message.

column.name: roomId
column.comment: The ID of the room the message is in.

column.name: userId
column.comment: The ID of the user who made the message.

column.name: userName
column.comment: The name of the user who made the message.

column.name: userGroup
column.comment: The ID of the admin-defined usergroup of the user.

column.name: allGroups
column.comment: A comma-seperated list of admin-set groups the user is a part of.

column.name: socialGroups
column.comment: A comma-seperated list of groups the user has joined.

column.name: userFormatStart
column.comment: Formatting to be prepended to the user's name.

column.name: userFormatEnd
column.comment: Formatting to be appended to the user's name.

column.name: defaultFormatting
column.comment: The default formatting of the user's text (bitfield).

column.name: defaultHighlight
column.comment: The default highlight of the user's text.

column.name: defaultColor
column.comment: The default color of the user's text.

column.name: defaultFontface
column.comment: The default fontface of the user's text.

column.name: time
column.comment: The time the message was made on.

column.name: htmlText
column.comment: The HTML-formatted text of the message.

column.name: apiText
column.comment: The API-formatted text of the message.

column.name: flag
column.comment: The content-type flag set for the message.

column.name: id
column.comment: A unique ID for the log entry.

column.name: userId
column.comment: The user ID who performed the action.

column.name: time
column.comment: The time the action was performed on.

column.name: ip
column.comment: The IP of the user when the action was performed.

column.name: action
column.comment: The action performed.

column.name: data
column.comment: The associated data of the action.

column.name: phraseId
column.comment: A unique ID for the phrase

column.name: text_en
column.comment: The text of the message in English.

column.name: text_jp
column.comment: The text of the message in Japanese.

column.name: text_sp
column.comment: The text of the message in Spanish.

column.name: text_fr
column.comment: The text of the message in French.

column.name: text_ge
column.comment: The text of the message in German.

column.name: userId
column.comment: The ID of the user.

column.name: roomId
column.comment: The ID of the room.

column.name: time
column.comment: The time of the ping.

column.name: status
column.comment: The user's status.

column.name: typing
column.comment: Whether or not the user is typing.

column.name: roomId
column.comment: The unique ID for the room.

column.name: roomName
column.comment: The name of the room.

column.name: roomTopic
column.comment: The current topic of the room.

column.name: owner
column.comment: The owner/creator of the room.

column.name: allowedGroups
column.comment: A comma-seperated list of the IDs of the allowed groups in the room.

column.name: allowedUsers
column.comment: A comma-seperated list of the IDs of the allowed users in the room.

column.name: moderators
column.comment: A comma-seperated list of the IDs of the moderators of the room.

column.name: options
column.comment: A bitfield corrosponding to certain room options.

column.name: bbcode
column.comment: The level of bbcode allowed in the room.

column.name: lastMessageTime
column.comment: The time of the last message made in the room.

column.name: lastMessageId
column.comment: The ID of the last message made in the room.

column.name: userId
column.comment: The ID of the user.

column.name: roomId
column.comment: The ID of the room.

column.name: messages
column.comment: The number of messages made by the user in the room.

column.name: messageId
column.comment: The ID of the message.

column.name: phraseId
column.comment: The ID of the phrase found in the message.

column.name: phraseId
column.comment: A unique ID corrosponding to the phrase name/text.

column.name: phraseName
column.comment: The name/text of the phrase.

column.name: sessionId
column.comment: A unique ID corrosponding to all sessions. It is largely unused.

column.name: userId
column.comment: The ID of the user the session belongs to.

column.name: anonId
column.comment: A unique ID that can be used for anonymous users.

column.name: time
column.comment: The time the session was last renewed.

column.name: browser
column.comment: The useragent of the user of the session.

column.name: magicHash
column.comment: The session hash itself.

column.name: templateId
column.comment: The ID of the template.

column.name: templateName
column.comment: The name of the template, used for its retrievel.

column.name: vars
column.comment: PHP variables that need to be accessed by the template.

column.name: data
column.comment: The text/data associated with the template.

column.name: typeId
column.comment: The unique ID for the room.

column.name: extension
column.comment: The extension that will allow upload of files using these settings.

column.name: mime
column.comment: The content type to output files of this type as.

column.name: maxSize
column.comment: The maximum size (in bytes) files of this type can be.

column.name: container
column.comment: The container that should be used to output the file. This is recognized by clients for best viewing.

column.name: userId
column.comment: The unique ID of the user.

column.name: userName
column.comment: The user's name.

column.name: userGroup
column.comment: The admin-set usergroup ID of the user.

column.name: allGroups
column.comment: A comma-seperated list of the IDs of all admin-set groups the user is a part of. This is not used on PHPBB and Vanilla logins (both instead use socialGroups).

column.name: socialGroups
column.comment: A comma-seperated list of the ids of all groups the user has joined.

column.name: userFormatStart
column.comment: HTML-formatting to be prepended to the user's name for its display.

column.name: userFormatEnd
column.comment: HTML-formatting to be appended to the user's name for its display.

column.name: password
column.comment: The hashed password of the user. It is only used on vanilla logins.

column.name: joinDate
column.comment: The date the user joined. It may not be used on logins other than vanilla.

column.name: birthDate
column.comment: The date of the user's birth, used for parental control settings.

column.name: lastSync
column.comment: The date the userdata was last synced. This is not applicable for vanilla logins.

column.name: defaultRoom
column.comment: The user's default room.

column.name: favRooms
column.comment: A comma-seperated list of rooms the user has ranked as being favourites.

column.name: watchRooms
column.comment: A comma-seperated list of rooms the user would like to be notified about when new messages are made

column.name: status
column.comment: The user's activity status.

column.name: defaultFormatting
column.comment: A bitfield corrosponding to the user's defaulting formatting (e.g. bold, italics) of all messages.

column.name: defaultHighlight
column.comment: The user's default highlight colour used for all messages.

column.name: defaultColor
column.comment: The user's default foreground colour used for all messages.

column.name: defaultFontface
column.comment: The fontface ID used for all of the user's messages.

column.name: settings
column.comment: A bitfield corrosponding to different user settings.

column.name: userPrivs
column.comment: A bitfield corrosponding to admin-set user priviledges.

column.name: adminPrivs
column.comment: A bitfield corrosponding to admin-set administrative priviledges.

table.name: bbcode
table.column: <object width="420" height="255" wmode="transparent"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/$1=en&fs=1&rel=0&border=0"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/$1&hl=en&fs=1&rel=0&border=0" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowfullscreen="true" width="420" height="255" wmode="opaque"></embed></object>

table.column: 'Courier New', FreeMono, TwlgMono, Consolas, Courier, monospace

table.column: Cambria, Georgia, 'Liberation Serif', 'Times New Roman', serif

table.column: 'Trebuchet MS', Arial, Tahoma, Verdana, FreeSans, sans-serif

table.column: Arial, Verdana, 'Trebuchet MS', Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif

table.column: Tahoma, Verdana, 'Trebuchet MS', Arial, FreeSans, sans-serif

table.name: phrases
table.column: フリーズ の メッセンジャー

table.name: phrases
table.column: You see... our incredibly high standards of admittance, or perhaps just our unjust bias, has resulted in us unfairly denying you access to this probably-not-worth-your time room. We do apologize for being such snobs... but yet, we still are. So, we must now ask you to leave.

table.name: phrases
table.column: This room is a private room between you and another individual, and is not accessible to any other user or administrator. If you would like to ignore this person right click their userName and choose "Ignore". If you are being harrassed, please contact either Cat333Pokémon or FreezeWarp.

table.name: phrases
table.column: This room is not an official room, and as such is not actively moderated. Please excercise caution when talking to people you do not know, and do not reveal personal information.

table.name: phrases
table.column: You are not a part of this group, rather you are only granted access because you are an administrator. Please respect user privacy: do not post in this group unwanted, and moreover do not spy without due reason.

table.name: phrases
table.column: By default parental controls are enabled that help keep younger users safe. Check this to disable these features, however we take no responsibility for any reprecussions.

table.name: phrases
table.column: If checked, a "ding" will sound whenever a new message is received and you aren't there to see it.

table.name: phrases
table.column: This will disable default formatting some users use on their messages.

table.name: phrases
table.column: This will disable video embeds in rooms that allow them, replaced with a "click to activate" link.

table.name: phrases
table.column: This will disable image embeds in rooms that allow them, replaced with a link or alternate text.

table.name: phrases
table.column: This will show newer posts at the bottom instead of the top, as is common with many instant messenging programs.

table.name: phrases
table.column: This changes what room defaults when you first visit FreezeMessenger

table.name: phrases
table.column: These rooms will be monitored for new posts, similar to Private IMs.

table.name: phrases
table.column: We're sorry, but for the time being you have been banned from the chat. You may contact an administrator for more information.

table.name: phrases
table.column: Here you can find and search through every post made. Simply enter a room, time frame, and the number of results to show and we can get started:

table.name: phrases
table.column: After hours of intense computation, we have failed to locate the room you selected.

table.name: phrases
table.column: This room is marked as being mature, thus access has been restricted. Parental controls can be disabled from within your user options.

table.name: phrases
table.column: You did not specify a URL.

table.name: phrases
table.column: The URL does not appear to be a Youtube video.

table.name: phrases
table.column: That image does not exist or refuses to load.

table.name: phrases
table.column: That image is not of a valid type.

table.name: phrases
table.column: The file you are trying to upload is too large.

table.name: phrases
table.column: Could not upload the file for unknown reasons.

table.name: phrases
table.column: Your group's name. Note: This should not container anything vulgar or it will be deleted.

table.name: phrases
table.column: A comma-seperated list of User IDs who can view this chat. Moderators can see your conversation regardless of this setting. Use "*" for everybody.

table.name: phrases
table.column: A comma-seperated list of Group IDs who can view this chat. Moderators can see your conversation regardless of this setting. Use "*" for everybody.

table.name: phrases
table.column: A comma-seperated list of moderators who can delete posts from your group.

table.name: phrases
table.column: Mature rooms allow certain content that is otherwise not allowed in that users are required to enable access to these rooms first. In addition, the censor is disabled for all such rooms. <strong>Hatespeech, illegal content, and similar is disallowed regardless.

table.name: phrases
table.column: Only Allow Basic Formatting and Links

table.name: phrases
table.column: To prevent certain kinds of spam, different levels of BB code can be disallowed. Generally, this doesn\'t really come at much benefit anybody, save for the nitpicky (like us).

table.name: phrases
table.column: Your group was successfully created at:

table.name: phrases
table.column: You did not specify a name.

table.name: phrases
table.column: The name for your group is already taken.

table.name: phrases
table.column: You have been banned from creating rooms.

table.name: phrases
table.column: You must be the owner to edit a room.

table.name: phrases
table.column: This room is deleted, and as such may not be edited.

table.name: phrases
table.column: No user exists with that user title. Is it possible that you have changed your name recently?

table.name: phrases
table.column: You appeared to have entered a wrong password. Remeber, passwords are case sensitive.

table.name: phrases
table.column: Hello. Please Enter Your Login Credentials Below:

table.name: phrases
table.column: Disabling effects can lead to a performance and a reduction of "client-side" lag (that not related to the server). It has no side-effects, aside from not looking as pretty.

table.name: phrases
table.column: Showing avatars will reduce the overall amount of text by hiding post times and userNames with a small avatar to represent users. Times can be viewed by moving the mouse over each message.

table.name: phrases
table.column: Change the theming of the messenger to your liking. "Cupertino" and "jQueryUI" are good choices.

table.name: phrases
table.column: Users included here will be unable to contact you using private messaging.

table.name: rooms
table.column: Hit the Edit Room Button to Change Things or Use /topic to Change the Topic

table.name: templates
table.column:
• Intro
  • Rules
  • BBCode
  • Age
  • Reqs
  • FAQs
  • Bugs
FreezeMessenger 2.0 (FIM or FIM2) is an advanced AJAX-based online webmessenger and Instant Messenger substitute created to allow anybody to easily communicate with anybody else all across the web. It is highly sophisticated, supporting all modern browsers and utilizing various cutting-edge features in each. It was written from scratch by Joseph T. Parsons ("FreezeWarp") with PHP, MySQL, and other tricks along the way.
In no part of the chat, whether it be in a public, private, official, or nonofficial room, are you allowed to:
  • Promote or inflict hatespeech.
  • Post, link to, or encourage illegal material.
  • Encourage or enable another member to do any of the above.
The following tags are enabled for formatting:
  • +[text]+ - Bold a message.
  • _[text]_ - Underline a message.
  • /[text]/ - Italicize a message.
  • =[text]= - Strikethrough a message.
  • [b][text][/b] - Bold a message.
  • [u][text][/u] - Underline a message.
  • [i][text][/i] - Italicize a message.
  • [s][text][/s] - Strikethrough a message.
  • [url]http://example.com/[/url] - Link a URL.
  • [url=http://example.com/]Example[/url] - Link a URL
  • [img]http://example.com/image.png[/img] - Link an Image.
  • [img=":P"]http://example.com/image.png[/img] - Link an image with alt text.
  • [youtube]{youtubeCode}[/youtube] - Include a Youtube video.
We take no responsibility for any harrassment, hate speach, or other issues users may encounter, however we will do our best to stop them if they are reported to proper administrative staff. Users will not be allowed to see mature rooms unless they have specified the "Disable Parental Controls" option in their user settings, and are encouraged to only talk to people privately whom they know.

Keep in mind all content is heavily encrytped for privacy. Private conversations may only be viewed by server administration when neccessary, but can not be accessed by chat staff.
FIM's WebInterface will work with any of the following browsers:
  • Google Chrome / Chromium
  • Internet Explorer 8+
  • Firefox 4+
  • Opera 11+
  • Safari 5+


  • Where Do I Report Bugs? - Bugs can be reported to the Google Code bugtracker.
  • Can I Donate to this Awesome Project? - Please do. It really helps keep development going.
Below is basic information useful for submitting bug reports:
